name: Delivery Turbo S
description:
Summary

Delivery Turbo S is a 3D runner game set in a sci-fi, cyberpunk city. 

You play as a high-speed delivery drone that must deliver a package from point A to point B by traversing through sci-fi city streets.

Avoid obstacles, such as billboards and walkways, while also dealing with police drones.

  • Switch between free movement to deal with police drones and a snap-to-centre movement to quickly weave through the cluttered city streets.
  • Use the boost wisely to finish the level as fast as you can without losing control and crashing!
  • Hold the shield to block enemy fire, or parry lasers to destroy those police drones!
  • Keep your packages safe! You’re relying on the customer’s rating to build your reputation.
Platforms

This prototype runs on Windows PC

This title will be for PlayStation 4/5, Xbox One/Series X|S
